title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Delayed registration of birth is the registration of a birth one year or more after its occurrence. (b) A supporting affidavit is a sworn statement substantiating the facts entered on the birth certificate. (c) A written record is one which confirms the facts entered on the birth certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

36.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
